items.sentence: I hope to be able to come back to Boston someday.
I just want you to know that I regret doing that.
Let\'s go get snockered like we did last weekend.
Let\'s see if we can find out what the matter is.
Everyone says I\'m bad, and maybe they\'re right.
Someone crashed into me on my way home yesterday.
Something needs to be done about this right away.
Tom is the only one likely to be able to do that.
Tom still doesn\'t know who\'s going to be there.
I\'d have come to Boston with you if I could\'ve.
Tom wasn\'t given the chance that you and I were.
Tom pointed to the floor near Mary\'s right foot.
Tom and Mary got married this year in the spring.
Tom and Mary hope their next child will be a boy.
Tom certainly knew what he was doing was illegal.
Tom crawled into bed and fell asleep immediately.
Three people are still missing and presumed dead.
Tom certainly isn\'t as bad as Mary claims he is.
Tom couldn\'t sleep at all because it was so hot.
Tom has been living in Boston since last October.
